Articles.Content:
It would be very awesome if we could have a window where we could view what all the goo has said or acted like on planets and in orbit. Maybe a graph or a diagram with all the planets - and what all the goo behaved like or felt like in those conditions.

*mun: good likes it, feels likee home...

*mun crater:??(becasue unexploared)

*kerbin:too hot (desert)

*kerbin:??

*kerbin:??

or just show the ones we have already unlocked...
